title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 § 638.10 - Referenced material
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 § 638.10 - Referenced material

State Regulations

The following referenced documents have been filed with the Department of State. The documents are available from the addresses listed or, in the case of Federal publications, from the Superintendent of Documents, U.S. Government Printing Office, Washington, DC 20402, and for inspection and copying at the Department of Environmental Conservation, 625 Broadway, Albany, NY 12233-0001. For each reference, additional sources for hard copy materials and web sites, where appropriate, are provided: Table 10.1

N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
§
638.10

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
